Interface patientAppointmentManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
PatientAppointmentManager
public interface patientAppointmentManagement
The patientAppointmentManagement interface defines methods for managing patient appointments, including scheduling, canceling, and rescheduling appointments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancelAppointment(String appointmentId, String patientId)
    Cancels an appointment for a patient based on the specified appointment ID.
    void
    rescheduleAppointment(String patientId, String patientName, String appointmentId, String newAppointmentId)
    Reschedules an existing appointment to a new appointment slot if available.
    void
    scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String patientName, String appointmentId)
    Schedules an appointment for a patient with the specified appointment ID.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      void scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String patientName, String appointmentId)
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with the specified appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient scheduling the appointment.
      patientName - The name of the patient.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be scheduled.

    • cancelAppointment

      void cancelAppointment(String appointmentId, String patientId)
      Cancels an appointment for a patient based on the specified appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be canceled.
      patientId - The ID of the patient canceling the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      void rescheduleAppointment(String patientId, String patientName, String appointmentId, String newAppointmentId) throws IOException
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new appointment slot if available.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient rescheduling the appointment.
      patientName - The name of the patient.
      appointmentId - The current appointment ID to be rescheduled.
      newAppointmentId - The new appointment ID for rescheduling.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the rescheduling.
